description:
Changelog - 2022-11-04

This is an urgent update of fixing serious crash bug by birthday function

Changelog - 2022-10-04

Calculator
1. New Material Calculator (Only available in Material Style)

- New UI design
- New algorithm & display result in real-time
2. Replaced saving translation

UI
1. Removed Alarm Button
2. Fixed Style-Exchange crash bug
3. Fixed App Icon display issue
4. Fixed Crash bug in Splash page
5. Little improve of Game Style's UI

Characters, weapons and artifacts
1. Added characters info :
- Candace
- Cyno
- Nilou
- Layla
- Nahida
2. Fixed detail mistakes in :
- Arataki_Itto
- Beidou
- Shikanoin_Heizou
3. Added weapons in 3.1 & 3.2
4. Updated new Character's birthday

Changelog - 2022-08-23

Calculator
1. New Material Calculator (Only available in Game Style)
- Re-designed UI layout
- Improved User Experience of Calculating Characters, Weapons, Artifacts
- Added new ascension materials for new characters
- Full-List Screenshot (Press the camera button in Result Page and the material list will export as png)
- Bugs from old version's calculator were FIXED !

UI
1. Replace the display format of character's birthday (This version will be MM-DD)

Characters, weapons and artifacts
1. Added advice and status of :
- Aloy
- Arataki_Itto
- Gorou
- Kamisato_Ayato
- Kujou_Sara
- Kuki_Shinobu
- Shikanoin_Heizou
- Yelan
2. Fixed bugs/ detail mistakes in :
- Eula
- Raiden_Shogun
3. Added two new artifact sets (Including ico, info)

Changelog - 2022-07-19

UI
1. Some of the UI have already suitable for landscape device
2. Fixed display error of characters status
3. Fixed choice error of weapon status
4. Support Android 13 Themed icon
5. Fixed error of unable to open app if failed to check update.
6. Fixed layout problem of weapons ascending materials.

Characters and weapons
1. Added Collei, Dori and Taghniari info
2. Added weapons' info
3. Added Diluc and Fischl event suit.

Voc-夜芷冰 Birthday Special Version
Btw, there will not have any extra function appear since Voc didn't have enough idea of it. QAQ

Changelog - 2022-05-17

UI
1. Added new List Style [Card],[Details], thx for @SipTik#1171 's help
2. Background filter's transparent has been changed to higher
3. Added 2 new UI style , user can choose which they want when first open the app (after update), there have quite much things re-newed, we wish enjoy these nice UI style.
4. Added different new functions in 2 new UI style
5. Improved the user experience at Home page
6. Add tutorial
7. Fixed Calculator laggy problem

Changelog - 2021-03-31

Calculator
1. Fixed display error of result item

Characters and weapons
1. Added Qiqi ~ Zhongli's character advice

UI
1. Improved lists' filter function
2. Re-design Character, Artifacts and Weapons list, thx for 2O48#9733 's help :person_bowing:
3. Added event suit function
4. Suitable for landscape device
5. Character Info Display District Icon
6. Press Animation
7. Fixed Traveller display error
8. Character Info added more suggestions
9. Character Info scroll & deleted background display
10. Updated Special Thanks Page
11. Added Yelan & Kuki in character list (Preview only) and calculator

Changelog - 2021-02-20

Calculator
1. New Calculator released : Buff Calculator [Version Albedo]
2. Fixed display error of Artifact Owner
3. Boss Magatsu Mitake Narukami no Mikoto image was added
4. Ayato upgrade data is available (Buff part will be done at 2.6 update)
5. Calculate Sheet's naming error was fixed

UI
1. Fixed error of keeping show update after downloaded
2. Ayato was added (Without character info)
3. Update Function fixed
4. Yae Miko's image has changed to a non-background version, thx for @SipTik#1171 help
5. Updated Special Thanks Page and Link Page

Changelog - 2021-02-01

Characters
1. Fixed Yae Miko's weapons type display

UI
1.Use dynamic file update intead of solid file update

Changelog - 2021-01-26

Characters and weapons
1. Fixed translation problem of ru-RU
2. Added Yae Miko and two new weapons' translation. (ru-RU will include at next update)
3. Fixed Birthday error of some characters

UI
1. Changelog bug fixed
2. Refresh date & birthday UI after setting changed

Changelog - 2021-01-17

Characters and weapons
1. Fixed Display error of some weapons
2. Fixed translation problem of ru-RU

UI
1. Fixed search bug of lists
2. Changelog

Changelog - 2021-01-10

Characters and weapons
1. Fixed Display error of some weapons
2. Fixed Display error of Character Talent Layout
3. Fixed wrong set of some character's advice
4. Added Thoma's birthday

UI
1. Added translations of Calculator & Setting
2. Added [Traveler Sex Setting] function -> See as Setting page (request by Loliness#0599)
3. Fixed display error of Lists' background & choosed list background
4. Fixed wrong choose error when not set the artifact type
5. Added character icon below calculator's choosed artifacts and weapons.

Changelog - 2021-01-08

Calculator1. [Progress Report] New function has already done 50%, will be release at 2.5.0 or earlier
2. Fixed display error of character skills' name (API <= 27)
3. Added Gorou, Itto, Shenhe and Yun Jin's ascension materials.
4. Reset the max item count in same row
5. Added a part of Yae Miko's calculation data

Characters and weapons
1. Added Gorou, Itto, Yun Jin, Shenhe Information.
2. Added 2.3 & 2.4 new weapons' details.
3. Added Yae Miko into the Character List. (Display only)
4. Added Gorou, Itto, Yun Jin, Shenhe, Yae Miko and ???'s birthday

UI
1. Fixed Android 8.1 or below (API <= 27) unable read character, artifacts, weapons' information problem.
2. Fixed search error of weapons, this way will also use in other two later
3. Added new types of theme. Code 'Blue Sea','Pinky Day','Dream Color','Cyber Color','Cream Color'
4. Added custom background function -> Only accept PNG,JPG,JPEG,GIF
5. Changed some UI's background design for new function

Github
Will release the source after upload 2.4.0-gp update
